properties.areaDesc: Maalaea Bay; Big Island Southeast Waters; Pailolo Channel; Big Island Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 3:06AM HST until February 3 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast to east winds up to 25 kt, and seas up to 11
feet, except 2 to 3 feet in Maalaea bay.

* WHERE...Maalaea Bay, Pailolo Channel, Big Island Leeward
Waters and Big Island Southeast Waters.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY
